resources.string: Keep track of your trusted home, personal and professional providers in one location and Connect with your friends and family to Discover new providers. Its Easy And Free!
Easily add local service providers, friends and family with the click of few buttons and start simplifying your life.
Use the power of your network to share,find and engage with trusted providers in your area.Experience the simplicity of virtual word-of-mouth.
Call, Chat, Email, Schedule and Pay your providers from one, easy to use, platform. No more digging through drawers, emails or text messages to find the go-to you're looking for.
